es_MX.166ZQv: Help us to find them a loving home
es_MX.1j7yIm: How do we admit new cats to KOCHKA Caf√©?
es_MX.ce3OF: Each cat goes through a quarantine that lasts a minimum of 14 days. During this period we give them necessary medical care, deworming, recommended vaccination, and sterilization (in case their age allows that). Only after that, the cats can enter our caf√© and can be adopted.
es_MX.2BkynX: Older cats go through the same process except they already have to be sterilized before we can accept them. We cannot accept adult cats that are not sterilized.
es_MX.27LuJY: How can you adopt a new cat?
es_MX.3ccSX7: We try to create an environment supporting reasonable adoptions only. Every person who wants to adopt a cat has to fill a questionnaire to make sure our cats will find a safe and loving home. We also conduct an interview and ask for a financial contribution to cover part of the costs connected with the cats' medical treatment.
es_MX.2MVDcK: It is also necessary to visit us in person first to get familiar with our cats. It's not possible to adopt a cat from KOCHKA Caf√© without visiting us first.
es_MX.AJWCy: sterilization surgery (in case the age allows it)
es_MX.4sInH6: Generally speaking, we do not make any profit from the adoption fees. We usually spend more money on the cats to give them a great and healthy life. The adoption fee simply helps us to lower the financial impact on our business.
es_MX.XQcrj: *High-interest animals may have a higher adoption fee. Please, get in touch with us for details.
es_MX.gSO6N: Before considering adoption, please make sure that:
es_MX.DepQ2: you filled the adoption form and it was approved
es_MX.4r7zn0: you have valid INE and "comprobante de domicilio"
es_MX.4Czm7q: you understand the associated adoption fees
es_MX.3Z3ZVj: you mean the adoption seriously and are able to give the adopted cat a great life
